entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
